text: Portrait of Fray Hortensio Felix Paravicino is an oil painting by El Greco. It was painted in 1609. It measures 112.1 × 86.1 cm (44.1 × 33.9 in). It hangs in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston. Category:Paintings by El Greco Category:17th- century paintings Category:1600s works
title: Portrait of Fray Hortensio Felix Paravicino
